programme.title: The Fishmonger
programme.desc: The Fishmonger shows how underutilized fish are making their way to U.S. restuarants and dinner tables.

programme.title: The Sporting Chef
programme.desc: Chef Scott Leysath is home in his kitchen for this one, and he's got a bunch of trout to cook. Today's guests feature Susie Jimenez, Tommy Gomes, Stacy Lyn Harris, Brad Fenson, Cee Dub, and Buddy T.

programme.title: Fishing the Wild with Mike Robinson
programme.desc: Mike vists Iceland to catch Atlantic salmon and meet a wild food chef. Part 1.

programme.title: Wild Fish Masterclass with Mike Robinson
programme.desc: Mike cooks Goan fish curry - a South Indian classic - from fish butchery to a completed dish - all in easy to follow stages.

programme.title: Wild Fish Wild Places
programme.desc: Sandspit Adventures is home to some of the most epic bottom fishing on the planet. The WFWP crew heads out west on the island or Haida Gwaii to chase these monsters.

programme.title: Hunt Fish Maniac
programme.desc: In this episode, Paul visits the Queen Charlotte's Safaris lodge, located in the salmon fishing Mecca of Haida Gwaii, British Columbia.

programme.title: Das Boat
programme.desc: In the first episode of Season 2, Steve introduces you to the new Das Boatâ€”Dos Boat. After a bumpy start, Steve gets to South Haven, Michigan, where he recruits the help of local charter captain Grant Gully. Steve, Grant, and a local fabricator put in ten hours of work getting the boat ready to fish for lake trout in 100 feet of water.

programme.title: WildFed
programme.desc: Daniel heads to Kentucky to Harvest 17-year periodical Cicadas with entomologist, Dr. Jonathan Larson. Chef Pratrick Roney prepares a Kentucky Bourbon paired Cicada feast, as Daniel is welcomed by Outdoorsman Austin Musselman at Ashbourne Farms.

programme.title: The Fishmonger
programme.desc: The Fishmonger shows how underutilized fish are making their way to U.S. restuarants and dinner tables.

programme.desc: Mike cooks Goan fish curry - a South Indian classic - from fish butchery to a completed dish - all in easy to follow stages.

programme.title: The Obsession of Carter Andrews
programme.desc: Carter Andrews shares his favorite moments and messages from the year.

programme.title: Livin' the Dream with Captain Jimmy Nelson
programme.sub-title: Cuberas and Roosters of Costa Rica
programme.desc: Capt. Jimmy and Luiza head to Crocodile Bay Resort in Costa Rica and after landing a giant cubera, they target big roosters!

programme.title: Bill Dance Saltwater
programme.sub-title: He Does It 'Cause He Loves It Part 1
programme.desc: Bill joins guide Josh Nelson of Outcast Fishing Charters on Florida's beautiful Emerald Coast for some redfishing fun in Destin, Florida. Part 1.

programme.title: The Seahunter
programme.desc: Rob takes the all time winningest motocross champion Ricky Carmichael fishing for tarpon and big sharks in the Florida Keys.

programme.title: BigWater Adventures
programme.sub-title: Bull Redfish of St. Simons Island
programme.desc: The fall redfish run with Captain Greg Hildreth of St. Simons Island, Georgia.

programme.title: Trev Gowdy's Monster Fish
programme.desc: Marlin--Costa Rica has that wide-open bite that most people dream of. Join Fred Lavitman as he explores these rich waters in search of massive marlin.

programme.title: Spear Life
programme.desc: Heading out of their backyard in Anna Maria Island, the boys are spearfishing with one goal in mind - to get Jon and Coby their first ever African pompanos. With the help of Gary, the guys hope to bag a couple of these monster fish to bring back and cook up a delicious meal for the whole crew.

programme.title: Facts of Fishing
programme.desc: Tiny baits can still get big bites as Dave proves, pairing the brand new Berkley Lil General with a Ned Head for largemouth bass.

programme.title: Fishing with Roland Martin
programme.desc: Roland and Captain Jimmy Wheeler crash through the mangroves to get way up the small tide creeks for three to twenty pound tarpon on topwater, swimbaits and flukes. Super action with several double hook ups.

programme.title: In-Fisherman TV
programme.desc: The In-Fisherman staff reveals new grass tactics for largemouth bass.

programme.title: Lake Commandos
programme.desc: Normally, late summer is a good time for bass, but the bite was truly tough when Steve and Swagger Tackle owner Travis Nadeau battled it out. Who wins?

programme.title: Zona's Awesome Fishing Show
programme.desc: 2020 was a long, strange year for everyone and nothing seems more fitting to look back at this season than sitting in the frigid winter on a sheet of ice.

programme.title: Zona's Awesome Fishing Show

programme.title: Pelican's Ultimate Match Fishing
programme.desc: Returning champion Jonathon Vandam takes the next step toward repeat against James Watson in semifinal match 2 from Pickwick Lake

programme.title: Force on Force
programme.desc: In this epsiode of Strike King's Force on Force presented by Skeeter Boats, it's Qualifying Round 1 with the Jarheads and the Grunts going head to head.

programme.title: The Hunt for Monster Bass
programme.sub-title: Monster Bass in the Dead of Winter
programme.desc: Host Ott DeFoe fights icy conditions and frozen rods as he hunts down double-digit largemouth bass in early January on Lake Chickamuga, Tennessee.

programme.title: Major League Fishing
programme.desc: Eight anglers compete on Douglas Lake to advance in the Academy Sports and Outdoors Heritage Cup, presented by Magallen Outdoors, from Knoxville, Tennessee. Only six will move on to the Sudden Death Rounds.
